subject: Control Panel Cable
description_text:
Hello. I need a cable for the Simpson control panel, it's broken. Where can I get a purchase link? Thank you.

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi carlos gonzalez velazqquez, Please provide your order number and photos of the damaged part. I will help you analyze the situation, and we may be able to send you a replacement.
Hi carlos gonzalez velazqquez, Do you need a hub cable?

The same cable as in the photo....yes

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

Yes

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
Hi carlos gonzalez velazqquez, Please provide your address information so we can resend you a data cable.

Carlos, 616750205 Empordà 2 3/4 Cornellà de Llobregat, Barcelona, ES, 08940 Spain.

Thank you very much

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
Hi carlos gonzalez velazqquez, Your product has been shipped. The logistics number is:YT2536400706106268. You can track it at this website:​https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=YT2536400706106268

THANK YOU FOR SENDING THE CABLE. GRATEFUL.

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
Hi carlos gonzalez velazqquez, You are welcome. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
